font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">When Prakriti and Purusha unite in the\nSahasr\u0101ra Chakra ( raising of Kundalini ) , knowledge, knower and the object of\nknowledge become one.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">&nbsp;The eternal and indestructible union between\nShiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static\naspect as well as in its dynamic one.&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Not only is Shakti responsible for\ncreation, it is also the agent of all change<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Shakti is manifested by\nShiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of\ncreation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Modern science repeats\nfrom our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable.&nbsp; So does consciousness and energy .&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In the highest planes they are\ninterchangeable, which is why we see a great incongruence between our spiritual\nexperiences and the external reality. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">In the higher\nmetaphysical realms and subtle planes of our consciousness the physical laws of\nour universe lose their validity.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><i>Tayor yad yamalam rupam\nsa samghatta iti smrtah---<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><i>Ananda-saktih saivokta\nyato visvam visrjyati,<o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><i>Na Sivah Saktirahito na\nSaktih Sivavarjita.&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">---(Tantraloka-Ahnika, 3.)&nbsp;&nbsp; 5000\nBC<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">\"The coupled form\nof these two (Shiva-Shakti) is called junction.&nbsp;\nThat is called the blissful Shakti from which creation arises\u201d</span><span style=\"font-size: 12pt;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">There is no Shiva\nwithout Shakti, nor Shakti without Shiva.\"<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Samkhya as you can see\nwas a masterpiece of modeling the ways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">The union of Shakti\nwith Shiva by Kundalini rise&nbsp; is the\nliberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death. <o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">The soul ( atman ) now\nattains highest frequency to merge with the mother field of brahmAn\u2014we call\nthis moksha , the aim of every Hindu.</span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: lime;\">What do all these characters\nlike Zakir Naik, UR Ananthamrthy, Maharishi Dayanand Sarasawi, Kalburgi,\nPansare, Dhabolkar, Kancha Ilaiah SQUEAK nay Shephard , BR Ambedkar, EVR\nPeriyar, Mahatma Phule saab, Wendy Doniger, Sheldon Pollock, literary fest drohis , white skinned Indophiles, JNU commie professor . font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">WHY DO YOU THINK I HAVE STARTED THIS BLOGSITE ?&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: x-large;\"><b style=\"background-color: cyan;\">WHY DO YOU THINK I HAVE BECOME THIS PLANETs NO 1 WRITER , WHEN I HAVE NOT EVEN STARTED ?&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Have you read Swami\nVivekananda\u2019s commentary of Patanjali sutras ? &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Is there ONE SINGLE SENTENCE --- &nbsp;repeat--- ONE SINGLE FUCKIN' SENTENCE of Vivekananda which we Hindus branded\nas heathen pagan savages by the white man can be proud of ?&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Below is his Vivekananda\u2019s\npathetic nay morbid understanding of Patanjali\u2019s yoga sutra .</span><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><a href=\"http://hinduonline.co/DigitalLibrary/SmallBooks/PatanjaliYogaSutraSwamiVivekanandaSanEng.pdf\">http://hinduonline.co/DigitalLibrary/SmallBooks/PatanjaliYogaSutraSwamiVivekanandaSanEng.pdf</a><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\">\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\">Does Vivekananda like\nDayanand Saraswati even understand an iota the glory of Sanatana Dharma?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"When the Brahma\ngranthi (in the heart) is pierced through by Pranayama, then a sort of\nhappiness is experienced in the vacuum of the heart, and the anahat sounds,\nlike various tinkling sounds of ornaments, are heard in the body.\" Hatha\nYoga Pradipika. 4.69 5000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Brahma granthi controls\nthe energies of mooladhara and swadhisthana chakras. It is linked with the urge\nto procreate and with deep survival instincts , instinctive knowledge,\nawareness and desires of sex. It is known as blockage of Brahma because it\nholds our consciousness at the level which is related to the desires of the\nphysical dimensions like sensuality, sex, procreation and the instinctive urge\nto survive which cannot be transcended. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Once this blockage is\nremoved from the realm of consciousness and energy, instincts of the deep\nrootedness and energy are released. The kundalini or primal energy is thus able\nto rise beyond mooladhra / swadhisthan without bogged down by the attractions\nto which our consciousness is hooked. Lord Brahma Gives the way.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rudra granthi governs\najna and sahasrara chakras. It represents the transformation of an existing\nform, idea or concept into the universal aspect. &nbsp;Here there is a breaking away of the old, the\nego awareness, the \"I\" Awareness, the mental awareness, the physical\nawareness .The sixth sense or the eye of intuition, as the third eye of Lord\nShiva is now open. You are now liberated. A liberated man does not get vestigial\ngoosebumps.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The granthis, the knots\nof avidya-kama-karma, are to be untied\u2014not broken through. Ganesha must untie\nthe first knot at the Mooladhara Chakra and guides his mother via the safe\nsushumna nadi passage.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\"When the Rudra\ngranthi is pierced, and the air enters the seat of the Lord (the space between\nthe eyebrows), then the perfect sound like that of a flute is produced.\"\nHatha Yoga Pradipika. 4.75 --5000 BC<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">WHAT DO MODERN\nSCIENTISTS WHO ADORE MADMAN CHARLES DARWIN KNOW ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">IT TAKES A CAPT AJIT\nVADAKAYIL TO TELL THE PLANET ABOUT A VESTIGIAL ORGAN NAMED APPENDIX .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">THE\nTRINITY DECIDES IF VESTIGIAL ORGANS MUST BE ACTIVATED OR NOT.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/human-appendix-misunderstood-organ-capt.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/human-appendix-misunderstood-organ-capt.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 22.4px; margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user\" style=\"font-style: normal; text-decoration: none;\">July 31, 2016 at 3:22 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nOnly you can explain Patanjali sutra and all about Hinduism we are blessed to know you. God bless you and family. Captain will you please explain Vigyan Bhairava Tantra of lord shiva</div>\n</div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hi, sd,</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The white invader\nreduced Tantra to perverted sex.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In Vigyan Bhairava\ntantra, Shiva the first yogi, responds to his wife\u2019s query about methods of\nDhyana \u2013he gives her 108 ways. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let me just quote one\nof them.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ahara means food.&nbsp; But this is just one aspect. Any sensory\ninput to your body and mind is an ahara. When you hear music it is ahara via\nyour ears. When you see a silent movie it is ahara via the eyes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The term pratyahara is\ncomposed of two Sanskrit words, prati and ahara.&nbsp; Indriya Pratyahara means literally\n\"control of ahara/ sensory inputs ,\"&nbsp;\nor in more erudite terms \"gaining mastery over external\ninfluences.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Just as a healthy body\ncan resists toxins and pathogens, a healthy mind can ward off the negative\nsensory influences around it.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you\nare easily disturbed by the noise and turmoil of the environment around you,&nbsp; or jolted out of your mind by every small\npothole of stress on the street of your life, practice&nbsp; pratyahara.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Without it, you will\nnot be able to meditate.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are higher levels\nof Pratyahara.&nbsp;&nbsp; Examples?&nbsp; Prana- pratyahara \u2014 control of prana .\nKarma-pratyahara \u2014 control of action,&nbsp;\nmano-pratyahara \u2014 withdrawal of mind from the senses.&nbsp; These are beyond the scope of this post.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shambhavi literally\nmeans - pertaining to Lord Shiva. Mudras are methods to control the flow of\nenergy within the nadis of a human body.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pure awareness is a\nsimple experience \u2014just a small gap in your thinking when you are without ego\n-- a small space of nothing--shuniata. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So so so-- \u201cNothing\u201d doesn\u2019t give\nanswers?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is the answer. !!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sabarimala pilgrimage\nis based on this priceless method.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: lime; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html\" style=\"background-color: lime;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html</a><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Deep peace is the side\neffects of this experience of \u201cno-thing\u201d or \u201cno-thought.\u201d&nbsp; It is the realization that you are more than\nyour thoughts.&nbsp; Something is there beyond\nyour mind.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum\nentrainment&nbsp; is a process that instantly\ngives the body, mind and spirit deep rest and fast healing.&nbsp; It works in seconds.&nbsp; Yes, pure awareness is the deepest rest you\ncan ever get\u2014and it is so dang easy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quantum entrainment\nseeker does \u201cnothing,\u201d yet everything gets done for him.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When we allow pure\nawareness to suffuse our consciousness, the magic begins.&nbsp;&nbsp; Quantum entrainment effectively heals the\nbody, mind, emotions, and spirit and centers you .&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By assuming the\nposition of Shambhavi Mudra a Yogi should see the self.&nbsp; When the Brahma is seen in the form of a dot\nhe should fix his mind on it and nowhere else.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nA Yogi who knows the science of Shambhavi he himself becomes Brahma&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Wear loose fitting\nclothes which does NOT constrict you in any way.&nbsp; Sit on a smooth surface , in a comfortable\nmeditation pose .&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>You will feel intense\nvibrations inside your ear \u2014 the cochlea spiral passage resonated to 7.83 hertz\n( OM frequeny and also earth\u2019s heart beat frequency ) and your brain produces\nNITRIC OXIDE .<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Simply be mindful of\nin-and-out diaphrgmic breathing where you stomach rises and falls.&nbsp;&nbsp; You may feel that your breathing is too\nshort, too long, too gentle or too heavy.&nbsp;\nDo not try to control it.&nbsp; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When you become\ndistracted, gently refocus your attention on your breathing.&nbsp;&nbsp; Restrict your attention to what is occurring\nin the immediate present moment.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>When you feel you have\nblocked out all ahara ( feed ) via your senses of smell, sight, hearing and\nfeeling , take a deep breath where you fill your lungs only 90 % and hold it\n.&nbsp; Put your tongue on your upper palate and\ntickle it for just 2 seconds and stop.<o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This field\nis the Advaita Hindu god brahmAn .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Contrary to what the\nimmoral idiots of other religions ( who ridicule Hindusim as with 33 million\ngods )&nbsp; think\u2014 our God is an intelligent\nfield which sustains the golden mean of 1.618 . This ratio is the basis of our\n11000 year old divine geometry Sri Yantra which holds the theory of everything\n.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The pathway of the\nlongitudinal sound waves through the passages of the shell conch follows the\ngolden mean spiral, and it has a positive effect on the cochlea spiral, which\nis basically a scalar wave generator when impinged by longitudinal sound waves\nof desired frequency.&nbsp;&nbsp; This has been\nnoticed by using Kirlean cameras. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Scalar fields permeate\nthe body tissues and enhance ion transport at cellular level..&nbsp;&nbsp; In every Hindu temple a shank conch exists.\nIt stimulates the Amygdala with positive vibrations .&nbsp; You enter a mysterious state of psychological\nflow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Healing is NOT a\nphysical process, rather it is mental. Modern medicine is all about destroying\nthe symptoms .&nbsp; ( never mind a pancreas\nis doing its job faithfully\u2014hey, remove it ).&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mind can wipe mistakes\noff the DNA blueprint and destroy any disease that has disturbed the\ndesign.&nbsp; DNA's ability to repair itself\nis affected adversely when a person is in depression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Meditation experiences\nsilence, and is devoid of drives, wishes, fears , thoughts and emotions.\nAfterwards when the mind returns to its usual level of consciousness, it has\nacquired some freedom to move..&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grace and peace are the\nhallmarks of a healthy non-delusional mind in a healthy body.. The happiness is\nstable.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do Shambhavi Mudra in a\ngrateful frame of mind , to thank the universal laws, which sustain this\nplanet.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For people who do NOT\nknow what the amygdala is\u2014<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All sensory data must\nfirst pass through the amygdala for emotional analyzing, before being sent off\nto the cerebral cortex for processing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The amygdala has in\nturn been implicated in nearly every psychiatric disorder.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Children with anxiety\ndisorders tend to have a smaller left amygdala. Amygdala uses more blood than\nany other part of the brain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We humans are conscious\ncreatures because we have more amygdala nuclei.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are functional\ndifferences between the right and left amygdala.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Electrical stimulations\nof the RIGHT amygdala induce negative emotions, especially fear and sadness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Amygdala is the center\nfor emotional intelligence, as all sensory data must first pass through the\namygdala for emotional analyzing, before being sent off to the cerebral cortex\nfor processing.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do Shambhavi mudra to\novercome emotional and mental blocks that create negativity and spoil your\nsocial relationships. . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Do it to boost your\nimmune system and to improve&nbsp; health and\nhappiness by allowing the body\u2019s natural intelligence to do whatever it takes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People without wisdom\nslog throughout their lives to earn money.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nJust when they are about to retire and enjoy the fruits of their labour\nthey find that they too sick .&nbsp; All their\nlife\u2019s earnings get swiped off in hospitals.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He now becomes a burden\nto the same people whom he loved and nurtured throughout his life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rings a bell?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The earliest documented\nuse of the word Tantra is in the Hindu text, the Rigveda (X.71.9) of 5000 BC,\nwhich show Tantra existed , especially in Kerala Malabar, and the NE of India\nbefore the Vedas were written.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantric spiritual\npractices and rituals&nbsp; aim to bring about\nan inner realization of the truth that \"Nothing exists that is not\nDivine\" (n\u0101\u015biva\u1e43 vidyate kvacit ) . Tantra deconstructs all pre-conceived\nnotions of the human condition.&nbsp; This\nallows the person to experience total liberation and then unity with ultimate\ntruth or reality. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantra seeks to access\nthe supra-mundane through the mundane, identifying the microcosm with the\nmacrocosm. Tantric practitioner seeks to use prana, an energy that flows\nthrough the universe (including one's own body) to attain goals that may be\nspiritual, material or both.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Tantric aim is to sublimate rather than to\nnegate relative reality. This process of sublimation consists of three phases:\npurification, elevation, and the \"reaffirmation of identity on the plane\nof pure consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The word Tantra means\n\"to manifest, to expand, to show and to weave.\" In this context, sex\nis thought to expand consciousness and to weave together the polarities of male\n(represented by &nbsp;Shiva), and female\n(embodied by his wife Shakti), into a harmonious whole.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The basic principle of\nTantra is unity. That can be expressed in many forms. It could be unity with\nthe world around you, or unity of spirit, which brings peace and clarity, or\nwhen related to sex, the unity of man and woman to bring about the ultimate pleasure\nand fulfillment. Once you achieve the desired unity, you reach a higher\nconsciousness and connect with a divine place. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When discussing Tantra\nand the idea of unity, it is necessary to include Shiva and Shakti, who\nrepresent masculine and feminine archetypes in Hindu symbolism.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva, the\nmale, is pure consciousness; Shakti, the female, is the power of creation \u2014\nshe's the life force energy that combines with his power of thought to manifest\nthe physical world. One cannot exist without the other, as the two are\ninseparable and it takes both powers working in harmony to keep the universe\nfunctioning<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vigyan Bhairav Tantra was\nabout 108 forms of meditation ( dharana or centering techniques ) to achieve\ncosmic consciousness. Bhairava is \u201c beyond consciousness \u201c\u2014a NO MIND STATE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vigyan Bhaiva Tantra\nwas penned down 7000 years ago.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Vigyan Bhaiva Tantra\nstarts with a question from Devi regarding the nature of reality. Parvati asks\nShiva about Universe, about fundamental nature of this world, how one can go\nbeyond space and time to understand this truth. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The book is all about\nShiva\u2019s answers to Devi\u2019s queries. He does not tell her what is. He goes on and\non giving her different dharanas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The book starts with\nParvati asking her husband Lord Shiva -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">O Shiva, what is your\nreality?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">What is this\nwonder-filled universe?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">What constitutes seed?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Who centers the\nuniversal wheel?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">What is this life\nbeyond form pervading forms?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">How may we enter it\nfully, above space and time, names and descriptions?<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Let my doubts be\ncleared!<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She is NOT asking him\nabout how to lick an purulent as$hole or suck a syphilitic di#k or slimy\nmethods to steal another man\u2019s wife . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Single messiah/ holy\nbook readers will NOT understand the ramifications of Lord Shiva\u2019s replies, as\nit is in such a loft plane. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is NOT a dialogue\nbetween a Guru and shishya\u2014but a dialogue between two lovers\u2014and hence is\nrefreshingly incisive, where the BEYOND IS EXPRESSED. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You need not be a woman\nto be a disciple, but you need to be in a feminine attitude of receptivity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Philosophy ( every\nfu#kin\u2019 philosophy is a lie ) is concerned with the mind and the brain is\nenough; your totality is not required. Tantra needs you in your totality, your\nevery cell among trillions .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shiva tells Parvati\n\u2013take your pick-- he tells her to choose anyone of the 108 methods. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga is suppression\nwith awareness; tantra is indulgence with awareness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Lord Shiva gives his\nwife Parvati most profound methods of centering oneself using a lover ( this is\nNOT sex) , achieving pure awareness, quantum entrainment, consciousness , prana\namplification , focusing the mind like a laser beam, the meaning of OM,\nchanneling the breath for Nitric oxide boost, the alpha / theta frequency\nstates, nadis, bindu of Sri Yantra geometry , shabda brahman, advaita brahmAn ,\nraising kundalini, the chakras, mudras, tattwas, delusions of Maya, core of\nShakti etc etc -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The modern man is NOT\nintelligent enough or perceptive enough to understand the ancient Tantra\u2014which\nhas been reduced to sex and perversion. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantra stands for deep\nexperiences. Anything experienced can be transcended; anything suppressed can\nnever be transcended.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If at all sex is\ninvolves it is only to achieve purity. A small child is NOT aware that he is\nstealing . He is NOT aware of his nakedness. This is why we Hindus do NOT\ncremate our young children who die. They do NOT have egos . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their minds are not\nharnessed by laws . Tantra transcends the mind and accept the whole of the\nhuman in complete totality . Mind is an order and it lives with de\ufb01nitions and\ndisciplines..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantra method is to be\naware of the desire , NOT to create any \ufb01ght, but to move in desire with full\nconsciousness,and only then you can transcend it. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Yoga is outgoing\nenergy, while tantra is energy moving inwards. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tantra is about depth,\nwhile yoga is about height.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HOW MANY OF OUR FAKE\nGURUS, LIVING IN LUXURY, HAVING 150 BRANCHES THROUGHOUT THE WORLD, WHO PRAISE\nHOMOSEXUALITY -- WHO COME ON BENAMI TV HAVE EVER TOLD YOU ALL THIS ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">I watch evangelist TV stations to have fun. I\nlaugh my guts out. &nbsp;&nbsp;The pea brained\nevangelist would be explaining Vedanta \u2013 and in between he will shove in Jesus\nin a most mindless fashion. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 250%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; and later when he said: \"Before Abraham\nwas, I am.\"[John 8:58 ]- &nbsp;BLAH BLAH&nbsp;</span></b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://me.yahoo.com/a/PaB0nCt_1ZUuaQx0zquxOpgAJDQZZzJRaw--\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">John</a></cite><span class=\"icon user\" style=\"font-weight: bold;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"https://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2016/07/sanatana-dharma-hinduism-exhumed-and_27.html?showComment=1469956867427#c5370778287166633455\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration: none;\">July 31, 2016 at 2:51 PM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_102MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nDear Captain Ajit,<br />\n<br />\nI have been following your blog very sincerely for some time. So much of the information is original and not to be found anywhere else on the internet. But I was surprised by your article on brahmacharya. India is the origin of the idea of celibacy and there still even today many in India who follow this noble way of life, though they will not found in the big cities( or aboard ships!) .<br />\n<br />\nBrahmacharya is semen retention, plain and simple \u2013 and this done through protecting the mind zealously and by being alone by oneself almost all the time. The eyes are protected \u2013 Visual Brahmacharya just as the mind. Then there will not even by nocturnal emissions.<br />\n<br />\nBy saying that brahmacharins are homosexuals, you are doing a great dis-service to India and Indians . There many young people who follow your blog and this article will do them great harm. Also even to Westerners who look up to India for matters of the Spirit. It will also reduce the credibility of your other articles where you are undoubltedly right.<br />\n<br />\nI am also surprised that nobody has bothered to correct such a big faux pas on your part. Or is it that you do not publish comments which are critical unless you also post a rejoinder? If that is the case, this comment might also not see the light of day! Whether you publish this or not, please think about it \u2013 Is it possible for a person who is living a worldly life and who is not a celibate to really understand this way of life without living actually it? This is like a person who has never entered the water all his life, trying to explain butterfly stroke!. There is no question of doubt. Sir, you very very wrong regarding your views on Brahmacharya.<br />\n<br />\nRegards,<br />\nJohn</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"comment-replies\" id=\"bc_0_102BR\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">From then on, the\nsadhaka is undisturbed by dualities. </span></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;cambria&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 14.0pt; line-height: 250%;\">\n\n\n\n</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Dvandva is about\nduality, the dance of opposites- the essense of Dvaita Vedanta. &nbsp;Liberated\npeople are not affected by dualities of Maya.<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The effect of Yoga is\nto put an end to the dichotomies or differentiation between the body and mind,\nmind and soul. None of the pairs of opposites can exist for the yogi who is one\nwith body, mind and soul. When body, mind and soul fuse in a perfect posture,\nthe sadhaka is in a state of beatitude. In such a sublime position, the mind,\nwhich is at the root of dualistic perception, loses its identity and ceases to\ndisturb him. Unity is achieved between body and mind and mind and soul.\nThereafter, one is undisturbed by the dualities.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;mangal&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u092a\u0924\u0902\u0917\u092e\u0915\u094d\u0924\u092e\u0938\u0941\u0930\u0938\u094d\u092f</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u0926\u094d\u092f\u094b\u0924\u092e\u093e\u0928\u093e\u0902</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;
