margin-top: 5px;\">\n</div>\n</li>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<li class=\"comment\" id=\"bc_0_1B\" kind=\"b\" style=\"background-color: #eeeeee; border-bottom: 0px; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px 0px 16px; padding: 0.25em 0px 0px;\"><div class=\"avatar-image-container\" style=\"float: left; margin: 0.2em 0px 0px; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; width: 36px;\">\n<img src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-57G2xiZ-5tM/WJwrrVpmOmI/AAAAAAABQqo/-9wsspdm4RAiWSVRYXpBpkgoVBQdEyLRQCK4B/s35/*\" style=\"border: 1px solid rgb(238, 238, 238); max-width: 36px;\" /></div>\n<div class=\"comment-block\" id=\"c3765823833678639593\" style=\"margin-left: 48px; position: relative;\">\n<div class=\"comment-header\" id=\"bc_0_1M\" kind=\"m\" style=\"margin: 0px 0px 8px;\">\n<cite class=\"user blog-author\" style=\"font-style: normal; font-weight: bold;\"><a href=\"https://www.blogger.com/profile/14410812789424637654\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">Capt. Ajit Vadakayil</a></cite><span class=\"icon user blog-author\" style=\"background-image: url(&quot;data:image/png; background-repeat: no-repeat; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; height: 18px; margin: 0px 0px -4px 6px; width: 18px;\"></span><span class=\"datetime secondary-text\" style=\"margin-left: 6px;\"><a href=\"http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2017/12/comments-overflow-for-inoperative-load_23.html?showComment=1513997582273#c3765823833678639593\" rel=\"nofollow\" style=\"color: #888888; text-decoration-line: none;\">December 23, 2017 at 8:23 AM</a></span></div>\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_1MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\nCONTINEUD FROM 1<br />\n<br />\nMAD MAN CHARLES DARWINS MIND IS TOO SHALLOW --HE CAN ONLY THINK OF MONKET TO MAN EVOLUTION--AND THAT ZEBRAs NECK BECAME LONGER BECAUSE LEAVES WENT HIGHER ON TREE BRANCHES.<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nIN THIS DNA AGE, WE TEACH OUR KIDS IN SCHOOL ABOUT DARWINs MISSING LINK<br />\n<br />\nAGAIN-- KARMA CONTROLS MOKSHA --WHICH MEANS YOUR SOUL GOES TO THE 7TH ASTRAL LAYER --AND YOU ARE NOW GOD YOURSELF AS YOU ( SOUL ) MATCHES THE MOTHER FIELDS HIGHEST FREQUENCY -NEVER TO BE RE-INDUCTED AGAIN BACK ON PLANET EARTH<br />\n<br />\nLONG AGO--BRAHMA SHEARED YOU OFF FROM HIS OWN BODY-- SEND YOU ON EARTH AT THE LOWEST FREQUENCY A TINY BALL OF ENERGY--<br />\n<br />\nYOU WENT THROUGH EVERY LIFE FORM ON EARTH -- TO FUNGUS TO BACTERIA TO PLANT TO BIRD TO ANIMAL TO CONSCIOUS MAMMAL ( CAN PASS COLOUR AND MIRROR TEST LIKE ELEPHANT/ DOLPHIN/ BONOBO ETC ) --TO HUMAN<br />\n<br />\nHUMANS WHO ARE NOT CRIMINALS AND HOMOSEXUALS ON DEATH --THEIR SOULS GET PARKED ON SECOND TO SIXTH LAYER. YAMA IS IN CHARGE --HE DECIDES BASED ON KARMIC BAGGAGE .<br />\n<br />\nTHERE IS NO PERMANENT HEAVEN OR HELL IN HINDUSIM. THE FIRST ASTRAL LAYER IS A SEMI TEMPORARY HELL --THE POPE STOLE THIS IDEA AS \"PURGATORY\"<br />\n<br />\nTEE HEEEEEEEE<br />\n<br />\nSO IF A HINDU GOES TO SABARIMALA -- HIS WHOLE IDEA IS TO GET INSPIRED TO LESSEN HIS KARMIC BAGGAGE.<br />\n<br />\nSABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE WORKS LIKE A MIRACLE--DRUNKEN WIFE BEATERS AND TOTAL NALAYAKS COME BACK REFORMED --ALL KNOW THIS<br />\n<br />\nTAKING A DIP IN PAMPA RIVER IS COMPULSORY --OR SABARIMALA PILGRIMAGE DOES NOT WORK.. WATER HOLDS MEMORY<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2013/01/sabarimala-makaravilakku-three-light.html<br />\n<br />\nREMEMBER DOING PUJA , VISITING TEMPLES , DOING SHRADDH FOR ANCESTORS , DIPPING IN GANGES --IS ALL TO PUT YOU IN A MENTAL FRAMEWORK OF \"GRATITUDE\"<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2011/02/gratitude-noblest-of-all-virtues-capt.html<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU ARE \" GRATEFUL \" YOUR BODY BECOMES A WONDERFUL MACHINE<br />\n<br />\nWHEN YOU DO REIKI --YOU HAVE TO BE IN A FEELING OF GRATITUDE TO THE SUPREME FORCE --IF YOU ARE UNABLE TO DO THAT, BECAUSE YOU ARE A CUNT, EVEN BEING GRATEFUL TO YOUR MOTHER OR PET CAT WORKS<br />\n<br />\nBOTH BRAIN LOBES HAVE TO BE SYNCHRONIZED BY SPIRIT LEVEL ( INNER EAR COCHLEA ) SITTING POSTURE--WITH LEGS IN A MOBIUS COIL CIRCUIT. IMMEDIATELY YOUR BODY EMANATES SCALAR WAVES FASTER THAN LIGHT<br />\n<br />\nCHINESE ARE MAKING QUANTUM COMPUTERS BASED ON \"QUANTUM ENTANGLEMENT \" -WHICH IS FASTER THAN LIGHT. YET WE TEACH OUR SCHOOL CHILDREN THAT FASTER THAN LIGHT COMMUNICATIONS ARE IMPOSSIBE<br />\n<br />\nLIGHT FROM QUASARS TRAVEL FASTER THAN LIGHT-- OUR GAYATRI MANTRA -BEING GRATEFUL TO OUR MOTHER WHICH PROVIDES LIGHT<br />\n<br />\nhttp://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.in/2017/07/gayatri-mantra-savitr-savitur-saraswati.html<br />\n<br />\nAAJ KELIYE ITNA COFFEE-- NAY-- KAAFI<br />\n<br />\ncapt ajit vadakayil<br />\n..</div>\n</div>\n</li>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
